title: MRW Blitzcrank's Compatability Service Gives Me Olaf
body:
Because all I need is a "bro"

http://i.imgur.com/yIfFH.gif

replies.body: You think that's bad? I got Amumu
lol i got ahri, be jealous

> lol i got ahri, be jealous

Gonna stay neutral. Got Ahri, kinda worried for my life but also fluffy tail.
Please. I got Rammus, and we all know that he's the best boyfriend.

you cant deny the fluffyness of **9** tails (thats right **9 fluffy tails **)

rammus is ok tho
Ah, but rammus knows how to treat a lady right ;)
